author: Sarah P.
body: Precision Gates did an amazing job automating our front gate. Super clean wiring and professional installation.

author: Mike L.
body: Great service and communication from start to finish. Highly recommend for anyone in Colorado needing gate automation.

author: David E.
body: Precision Gates & Automation has consistently provided top-tier service for our Colorado clients. Their team arrives on time, diagnoses issues quickly, and makes repairs with impressive efficiency. Unlike companies that guess, fail, and then recommend total system replacement, PGA demonstrates real technical knowledge and problem-solving. They know access control and security systems deeply, and they stand behind their work. They are also reliable partners for new installations â€” offering thoughtful planning, quality materials, and professional execution. I continue to hear positive feedback from businesses that trust PGA with their security needs.
